resources.string: Welcome to the realm of Simultanea! This realm is divided into the three worlds: Xelvana, Yhondyrr, and Zhiole.
Xelvana, the divine land of the skys. Home to the heavenly beings who feel they have the need to oversee other life in the realm.

Yhondyrr, the world of plenty. Different races, different faces, different places, and resources can be found in this bountiful world. But with that bountifulness comes diversity. Both sides of the coin of good and evil can be found here.
Zhiole, the barren prison. Dwelling place of fallen Xelvanians, and Yhondyrrians. The prison world houses the worst of the worst of criminals and fiends.
The three worlds collide when World Warp Portals appear around the world, tethering them to one another.
Will Xelvana be capable of maintaining the order between the three worlds?
With the possible return of its banished people, and considering the untrodden portal phenomena; what would happen to Yhondyrr?
What kind of havoc would the denizens of Zhiole wreak around the realm; will the other worlds find a way to contain them securely?
Interact, learn, and explore to know what befalls the Realm of Simultanea.
This button takes you to your Player Profile Page.\n\nHere you will find your high score, games played, currently selected character, and many more information.
This button takes you to the Settings Page.\n\nHere you are able to set your Player Name, and toggle whether you would like to play as a Task Master or as a Regular Player.
This button takes you to the Characters Page.\n\nHere you will be able to select your Game Avatar, and view the different lore and stats of each character.
This button takes you to the Game Lobby.\n\nHere you will be able to choose your game mode: Single Player, Multiplayer, or check instruction for playing the game.

Brutus - The Abyssal Barbarian.

An entity from a land unknown. Found unconscious by a group of barbarian warriors.
Having lost his memories, he does not remember where he came from, what he really is, and what his name was. Accepted as one of their own, the barbarians gave him the name Brutus. He wields a large shield and a battle axe.

Eve - The Silver Assassin

A Midland commoner. With no family around, she grew up by herself on the streets.
Her family died in the war between the Land Above and Down Under.
She is skilled in acrobatics and wields two silver-plated daggers.

Pandgeal - The Divine Panda Mage

One of the several Panda Mages descended from the Land Above to bring peace to Midland.
After witnessing the death of his fellow Panda Mages, he decided to stay in Midland to seek vengeance - to hunt for the mysterious Red Panda that betrayed them.
He wields a staff made of bamboo, imbued with divine energy.
Pandren - The Traitorous Panda Mage\n\nBetrayed the Panda Army during the Xelvana-Zhiole War.

Jack - The Malevolent Pumpkin Sorcerer

The spirit belonged to an evil sorcerer that was taken to Down Under after committing regicide.
Jack utilizes the dark magic he had studied before his fall.
One of the many skeletal bodies.
One of the many goblin raiders.
A sentient gelatinous creature possessing a human skull.
